text: @mdnij34 As long as it takes - even forever! Just because things are opening up, it doesn't mean the pandemic has stopped. I prefer to listen to medical professionals than the toddler who has caged himself behind the WH. Look at Fla, GA & Texas. They have insane spikes of #COVID19. 🤔
